alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 15 at 2:29AM CST until January 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Near Critical Fire Weather Conditions This Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong wind and low humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM CST this evening. * TIMING...Noon to 7 pm. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts around 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...15 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...65 to 70 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning and other activities that could lead to fire starts are strongly discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
